mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Circular space to former library stacks

Built with funds donated by Frederick Billings, native Vermonter and president of the Northern Pacific Railroad. Superseded by the Gus W. Bailey Library in 1961; renovated 1963 and 1984 as campus student center. [work]
